vue-basics.title: Vue Basics
vue-basics.description: Test your knowledge of Vue.js fundamentals

vue-intermediate.title: Vue Intermediate
vue-intermediate.description: Test your knowledge of Vue.js intermediate concepts

vueAdvanced.title: Vue Advanced
vueAdvanced.description: Test your knowledge of Vue.js advanced concepts

reactHooks.title: React Hooks
reactHooks.description: Test your knowledge of React Hooks

limitRule.title: Time Limit
limitRule.description: Each question has a designated time limit within which you must provide an answer. You can submit your answer before the time runs out to move on to the next question.

backtrackingRule.title: No Backtracking
backtrackingRule.description: Once you submit an answer, you cannot go back to change it. Be sure of your choice before moving forward.

automaticProgressionRule.title: Automatic Progression
automaticProgressionRule.description: If the time runs out or you leave the quiz page, you'll be automatically moved to the next question. Any selected choices will be saved, so make every second count!

resultView.title: Your total score is
resultView.subtitle: {correctAnswers} out of {totalQuestions} correct answers
resultView.description: You can download your certificate in your profile page
